faculties.name: Engineering
faculties.description: Fakultiyadda Injineerinka waxay diiradda saareysaa naqshadaynta, horumarinta, iyo dayactirka kaabayaasha, mashiinada, iyo teknoolojiyadda.

faculties.name: Medicine
faculties.description: Fakultiyadda Caafimaadka waxay ardayda u diyaarinaysaa xirfadaha daryeelka caafimaadka, sida in ay noqdaan dhakhaatiir, kalkaaliyeyaal, iyo xirfadlayaal kale oo caafimaad.

faculties.name: Business Administration
faculties.description: Fakultiyadda Maamulka Ganacsiga waxay ka kooban tahay maaraynta, maaliyadda, suuqgeynta, iyo xisaabinta.

faculties.name: Computer Science
faculties.description: Fakultiyadda Sayniska Kombuyuutarka waxay diiradda saareysaa horumarinta software-ka, falanqaynta xogta, iyo sirdoonka macmalka.

faculties.name: Arts
faculties.description: Fakultiyadda Fanka waxay ka kooban tahay daraasadaha bini'aadantinimada, luqadaha, taariikhda, iyo fanka hal-abuurka.
